name: Retrobloc
description:
Retrobloc is a 3d puzzle game, similar to the late 80's Block Out, for the ZX Spectrum 48k. The game is simple to play but hard to master!

Three different blocksets are available to challenge your skill.

Game controls are:

WASD : Move block

N or Space: Drop block

U, I, O, J, K, L: Rotate block
